title: Party cupcakes
ingredients: ['Cakes', '125g softened butter', '125g caster sugar', '2 medium eggs (at room temperature)', '125g self-raising flour', '2 tablespoons milk', '12 hole bun tray lined with paper-cases', 'Buttercream Topping', '175g softened butter (or low fat margarine)', '350g icing sugar', '3 tablespoons boiling water', 'few drops of vanilla extract', 'Strawberrry food colouring (optional)']
